name: supreme-dashboard
description: Supreme Development Environment Dashboard - Glassmorphic Admin UI with Fastify Backend

scripts.server:dev: cd server && PORT=3001 npm run dev
scripts.build: npm run client:build && npm run server:build
scripts.install:all: npm install && cd client && npm install && cd ../server && npm install
scripts.clean: pkill -f 'node.*index.js' || true && pkill -f 'npm run dev' || true && pkill -f 'vite' || true

author: Supreme Development Environment
